Package main

Class Inventry

java.lang.Object
main.Inventry
public class Inventry extends Object
class which holds players items in inventry and creates an instance of inventry
Author:
Angus Burrowes and Jed Atkinson

    • containsInstance

      public <E> boolean containsInstance(Class<? extends E> clazz)
      to check if an instance of an item already exists. if there is it can be used else make a new instance.
      Type Parameters:
      E - something
      Parameters:
      clazz - something else
      Returns:

    • buyItem

      public void buyItem(Item item, Player player)
      buys item from the store. Adds the item to the players inventory and removes the gold from their wallet
      Parameters:
      item - item being bought
      player - player who buys item

    • sellItem

      public void sellItem(int index, Player player)
      sells item from players inventory. Removes item and compensates player with gold.
      Parameters:
      index - index of the item to be removed.
      player - player who owns the item.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string of items in Inventory if there are any else it returns a string saying inventory empty
